reviews.content: Myself, I prefer the St. Cloud location... The staff here seems aloof, somewhat disrespectful and eager to leave. Doctor if very professional, though... Receptionist... Not that much.

Walked in for appointment and the lady at the front desk was extremely rude and did not want to honor appointment due to her leaving at 2 pm. Very unprofessional and bad ethics.    . I had to give a star to write this review!!! But they don't deserve anything. I understand being busy but at least have the common sense to call and let a person know they won't be able to take anymore patients.

My daughter needed a school physical. I went in as a walk in the day school started in our area because she had just moved here. Needless to say they were very busy with people who had waited last minute for the same thing but USA Medical Care had no problem taking us in. For only $20, my daughter had her physical done and a certificate printed. The staff is very friendly and they are up front with their costs and procedures. Nothing shady about this place. I have even used them when I was ill and an office visit of $39 when I don't have insurance was perfect.

The place was very filthy and dirty. The waiting wasn't long and the price wasn't expensive but the staff was rude and the doctor was too apathetic to give me a diagnose or even explain which medicine was for what purpose. They send me to do a blood test which was forever far away. Also they can only give you up to two days off from work/ school
I will recommend the place and the Dr very friendly and the staff very nice at the St cloud location. Price love it $150.00 for my physical blood included  and second visit.
